description: Try our easy to follow Chipotle & Lime Barbecued Prawns recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Chipotle & Lime Barbecued Prawns Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1kg medium green prawns, peeled, deveined, tails intact
tomatoes, sliced (and lime cheeks, to serve)
1 large lime, finely grated rind (and 2 tbs juice)

recipeInstructions.text: Place Western Star Spreadable Original Soft, chipotle, lime rind, lime juice and coriander in a bowl and stir until well combined. Spoon into a serving bowl.

Heat a barbecue hotplate or frying pan over a medium heat. When hot, add extra Western Star Spreadable Original Soft and oil. When the Spreadable has melted, add prawns and cook for 8-10 minutes, turning occasionally, or until cooked.

Place prawns on a platter topped with dollops of the flavoured Spreadable mixture while hot. Serve prawns with halved, toasted brioche buns, shredded lettuce, avocado, tomato, lime cheeks and remaining Spreadable mixture.
